lastly...\""},{"lineNumber":216893,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アン？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":216894,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん〜〜〜〜……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mmmmmm...\""},{"lineNumber":216895,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":216896,"originalJapaneseLine":"「行って来ますのちゅ〜……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm off, chu~...\""},{"lineNumber":216897,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ん〜〜〜〜……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Mmmmmm...\""},{"lineNumber":216898,"originalJapaneseLine":"リア女王はザンスに向けて","translatedEnglishLine":"Queen Lia puckered her lips toward Zansu"},{"lineNumber":216899,"originalJapaneseLine":"唇を突き出して待機していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and waited with lips pursed."},{"lineNumber":216900,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うしっ、お前ら行くぞー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, you guys, let's go!\""},{"lineNumber":216901,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザンスは無視して出発した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Zansu ignored it and departed."},{"lineNumber":216902,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーん、もう、照れー屋さん♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Aah, geez, such a shy one♪\""},{"lineNumber":216903,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃー、みんな頑張ってねー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, everyone, do your best!\""},{"lineNumber":216904,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス国女王にブンブンと手を振られて見送られ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Waved off energetically by Queen Lias of the Riezas Kingdom,"},{"lineNumber":216905,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなた達は出発した。","translatedEnglishLine":"you all set off."},{"lineNumber":216906,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やー、エネルギッシュなお母さん持つと、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Man, having such an energetic mother,"},{"lineNumber":216907,"originalJapaneseLine":"　色々と大変そうねー」","translatedEnglishLine":"must be tough in various ways.\""},{"lineNumber":216908,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったくだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Exactly."},{"lineNumber":216909,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とっとと俺に玉座を明け渡せっつってんだがな」","translatedEnglishLine":"I've already told her to hand over the throne to me quickly.\""},{"lineNumber":216910,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アン？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":216911,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どーか！　どーかお願いいたしますぅぅ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Please! Please, I beg you!\""},{"lineNumber":216912,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だ、だから爺さん！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"B-But old man!"},{"lineNumber":216913,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんなことをここで言われても困るんだよ！","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm troubled hearing something like that here!"},{"lineNumber":216914,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そういうのは役所に行ってだなぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"You should take that kind of thing to the government office...\""},{"lineNumber":216915,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい、そこ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, you there.\""},{"lineNumber":216916,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh...?\""},{"lineNumber":216917,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ここはリーザス国の城下町、天下の往来だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This is a castle town of Riezas Kingdom, a major thoroughfare in the land."},{"lineNumber":216918,"originalJapaneseLine":"　塞いでんじゃねーぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't block the way.\""},{"lineNumber":216919,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こ、これはザンス様！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-Is that Lord Zansu!?\""},{"lineNumber":216920,"originalJapaneseLine":"兵士はザンスを見た途端、","translatedEnglishLine":"The soldier, the moment he saw Zansu,"},{"lineNumber":216921,"originalJapaneseLine":"背筋を伸ばし、リーザス式の礼をした。","translatedEnglishLine":"straightened his back and gave a Riezas-style salute."},{"lineNumber":216922,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、それがこの老人が動かなくて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-This old man won't move...\""},{"lineNumber":216923,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おお、偉いお方ですか！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, is he an important person!? "},{"lineNumber":216924,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ど、どうか我が村をお救い下さい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"P-Please save our village!\""},{"lineNumber":216925,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私はガゴという農村の村長です！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I am the village chief of a farming village called Gago!"},{"lineNumber":216926,"originalJapaneseLine":"　村付近の街道に魔獣カースAが巣くっており、","translatedEnglishLine":"Monster Curse A has nested on the highway near our village,"},{"lineNumber":216927,"originalJapaneseLine":"　た、大変困っています！」","translatedEnglishLine":"and we're having serious trouble!\""},{"lineNumber":216928,"originalJapaneseLine":"「街道が使えない以上、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Since the highway is unusable,"},{"lineNumber":216929,"originalJapaneseLine":"　物資をまともに運ぶことも出来ず、","translatedEnglishLine":"we cannot properly transport supplies,"},{"lineNumber":216930,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうか、我が村をお救い下さいぃ〜……」","translatedEnglishLine":"please, save our village...\""},{"lineNumber":216931,"originalJapaneseLine":"「と、このような事情だそうで……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, that's the situation... um..."},{"lineNumber":216932,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その……どうすれば……」","translatedEnglishLine":"how should we handle this...?\""},{"lineNumber":216933,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔獣カースAとなると、その……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Speaking of Monster Curse A, well..."},{"lineNumber":216934,"originalJapaneseLine":"　赤の軍の出動が必要かと思いますが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I think deployment of the Red Army is necessary...\""},{"lineNumber":216935,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……お前が軍事に口出すのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...You're meddling in military affairs?\""},{"lineNumber":216936,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっ！？　も、申し訳ありません！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh!? I-I'm sorry!\""},{"lineNumber":216937,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふむ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm...\""},{"lineNumber":216938,"originalJapaneseLine":"「警備隊でどうにかしな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Have the guards handle it."},{"lineNumber":216939,"originalJapaneseLine":"　赤の軍は国防の要、","translatedEnglishLine":"The Red Army is the key to national defense,"},{"lineNumber":216940,"originalJapaneseLine":"　雑魚の相手はしてられん」","translatedEnglishLine":"they can't be bothered with small fries.\""},{"lineNumber":216941,"originalJapaneseLine":"「りょ、了解いたしました！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U-understood!\""},{"lineNumber":216942,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、そんなぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"T-That's...\""},{"lineNumber":216943,"originalJapaneseLine":"「爺さん……可哀想だけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Old man... it's pitiful, but..."},{"lineNumber":216944,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こればっかりは仕方ねぇから……」","translatedEnglishLine":"this can't be helped...\""},{"lineNumber":216945,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前ら、行くぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You guys, let's go.\""},{"lineNumber":216946,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あらあら、冷たいのねー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh my, so cold-hearted.\""},{"lineNumber":216947,"originalJapaneseLine":"「国ってのは情で動いてんじゃねぇんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A country doesn't move based on sentiment.\""},{"lineNumber":216948,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺はリーザスの王に……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I am the king of Riezas..."},{"lineNumber":216949,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そしていずれ世界征服する男だぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"and a man who will one day conquer the world.\""},{"lineNumber":216950,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんな下らねぇことにとらわれていられるか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I can't be bothered with such trivial things.\""},{"lineNumber":216951,"originalJapaneseLine":"「せ、世界征服って……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-World conquest...?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア女王はザンスに向けて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Queen Lia puckered her lips toward Zansu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 唇を突き出して待機していた。
ザンスは無視して出発した。
「じゃー、みんな頑張ってねー！」
リーザス国女王にブンブンと手を振られて見送られ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Waved off energetically by Queen Lias of the Riezas Kingdom,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やー、エネルギッシュなお母さん持つと、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: must be tough in various ways."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とっとと俺に玉座を明け渡せっつってんだがな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've already told her to hand over the throne to me quickly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どーか！　どーかお願いいたしますぅぅ！」
そんなことをここで言われても困るんだよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm troubled hearing something like that here!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういうのは役所に行ってだなぁ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You should take that kind of thing to the government office..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここはリーザス国の城下町、天下の往来だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is a castle town of Riezas Kingdom, a major thoroughfare in the land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵士はザンスを見た途端、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The soldier, the moment he saw Zansu,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背筋を伸ばし、リーザス式の礼をした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: straightened his back and gave a Riezas-style salute.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、それがこの老人が動かなくて……」
ど、どうか我が村をお救い下さい！」
「私はガゴという農村の村長です！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I am the village chief of a farming village called Gago!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村付近の街道に魔獣カースAが巣くっており、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monster Curse A has nested on the highway near our village,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 物資をまともに運ぶことも出来ず、
どうか、我が村をお救い下さいぃ〜……」
「と、このような事情だそうで……
赤の軍の出動が必要かと思いますが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think deployment of the Red Army is necessary..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ！？　も、申し訳ありません！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Red Army is the key to national defense,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雑魚の相手はしてられん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they can't be bothered with small fries."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こればっかりは仕方ねぇから……」
「国ってのは情で動いてんじゃねぇんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A country doesn't move based on sentiment."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしていずれ世界征服する男だぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and a man who will one day conquer the world."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな下らねぇことにとらわれていられるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I can't be bothered with such trivial things."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Queen Lia puckered her lips toward Zansu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 唇を突き出して待機していた。
ザンスは無視して出発した。
「じゃー、みんな頑張ってねー！」
リーザス国女王にブンブンと手を振られて見送られ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Waved off energetically by Queen Lias of the Riezas Kingdom,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やー、エネルギッシュなお母さん持つと、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: must be tough in various ways."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とっとと俺に玉座を明け渡せっつってんだがな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've already told her to hand over the throne to me quickly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どーか！　どーかお願いいたしますぅぅ！」
そんなことをここで言われても困るんだよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm troubled hearing something like that here!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういうのは役所に行ってだなぁ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You should take that kind of thing to the government office..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここはリーザス国の城下町、天下の往来だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is a castle town of Riezas Kingdom, a major thoroughfare in the land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵士はザンスを見た途端、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The soldier, the moment he saw Zansu,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背筋を伸ばし、リーザス式の礼をした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: straightened his back and gave a Riezas-style salute.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、それがこの老人が動かなくて……」
ど、どうか我が村をお救い下さい！」
「私はガゴという農村の村長です！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I am the village chief of a farming village called Gago!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村付近の街道に魔獣カースAが巣くっており、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monster Curse A has nested on the highway near our village,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 物資をまともに運ぶことも出来ず、
どうか、我が村をお救い下さいぃ〜……」
「と、このような事情だそうで……
赤の軍の出動が必要かと思いますが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think deployment of the Red Army is necessary..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ！？　も、申し訳ありません！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Red Army is the key to national defense,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雑魚の相手はしてられん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they can't be bothered with small fries."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こればっかりは仕方ねぇから……」
「国ってのは情で動いてんじゃねぇんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A country doesn't move based on sentiment."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしていずれ世界征服する男だぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and a man who will one day conquer the world."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな下らねぇことにとらわれていられるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I can't be bothered with such trivial things."
